review: Very happy!  I now have two Fire TV boxes and two Fire TV sticks in my house.  My kids and I seem to watch whats on them more then cable.

review: We love the Stick. We use this almost every weekend to watch some of the latest moves being released. If your into movies, TV shows, etc...this is the way to go. You name it and it's on it for movie sections. I would defiantly recommend this to anyone.
